headline.main: Abroad; Germany, Russia and the Tripartite Pact

lead_paragraph: The note of desperation running through Hitler's tenth anniversary proclamation -- "in this war there will be neither victor nor vanquished, but only those who survive those who are destroyed" -- echoed in the speeches of Goering and Goebbels. Private reports from Berlin sound an even louder note of urgent alarm.
abstract: A O McCormick on Hitler Reich anniv proclamation statement
